title: aria-label attribute
description: Defines a string value that labels the current element. See related aria-labelledby.

related_issues.title: NVDA: button name change not conveyed

assertions.title: convey name changes when in focus
assertions.rationale: The user needs to know that that the name of a control has changed after interacting with it. This may be to convey a new purpose or to convey a state change which is provided by the name.
assertions.notes: This expectation is only for when the element with the attribute is focused by a screen reader (either keyboard focus or virtual focus). It is not meant to act like a live region.
